about_the_game: Lost Wallpapers DLC includes 5 exclusive NSFW wallpapers that were not included in the main game. Image resolution: 4K (3840×2160).

content_descriptors.notes: The Lost Wallpapers DLC contains 5 fully nude female characters drawn in an anime style. All characters are over 21 years old.
